description: Try the amazing flavour combo of tender butter chicken and roast cauliflower with fluffy rice. This easy dinner recipe is sure to become a family favourite.
keywords: Curry,Butter chicken,Seafood free,Egg free,Chicken dishes,Traybake,Weeknight dinner,Sesame free,Fakeaway,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Chicken bake,Chicken,Dinner Made Easy,Cauliflower,Dairy free
name: Easy Butter Chicken & Cauliflower Bake With Rice Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.3 cup Patak's butter chicken curry paste

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.
Place cauliflower in a large bowl. Add half the paste and toss to coat. Place on tray in a single layer. Bake for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, place chicken and remaining paste in the large bowl and toss to coat. Remove tray from oven and add chicken. Bake for a further 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
Top bake with coriander and pappadums. Serve with rice.
